title: Portal Gun Station
summaries: The Portal Gun Station is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord furniture item that can fire portals, similar to the Portal Gun, but as a stationary furniture item. The Portal Gun Station can be purchased from the Cyborg for 10 GC if the player has a Portal Gun in their inventory.

Right-clicking (⚷ Open / Activate) at the top of the Station toggles between orange and blue portal colors, or at the base to fire a portal. Right-clicking (⚷ Open / Activate) the left or right side of the Station rotates its shooting direction.

The station can also act as a <linked>mechanism</linked> if connected by <linked>wires</linked> to a triggering mechanism, such as a <linked>Switch</linked> or <linked>Lever</linked>. A wire connected to the top of the station toggles its portal color, the bottom fires a portal, and the left or right rotates the firing direction.

In multiplayer, if the source of activation is not directly a player, then the station will not fire nor swap colors, though any signal can rotate the station. For example, flipping a switch that fires a dart trap at a Teal Pressure Pad connected to the Station will not result in the Station firing, as it cannot find a player to bind its portals to. Note that other, player-based activators like arrows or minions will cause the Teal Pressure Pad to activate the station. Timers and Sensors also cannot fire the station.

Only one orange and one blue portal can exist at a time for each player that has the Portal Gun or Portal Gun Station, whether created by the former or the latter. Portal shots have a maximum range of 673 blocks and have a rate of fire of 120 shots per minute.
